scripts.db:generate: npm run db:build && PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE=binary prisma generate --schema prisma/schema/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push: npm run db:build && PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE=binary prisma db push --schema prisma/schema/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:dev: npm run db:build && PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE=binary prisma migrate dev --schema prisma/schema/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: npm run db:build && PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE=binary prisma migrate deploy --schema prisma/schema/schema.prisma
scripts.db:status: npm run db:build && PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE=binary prisma migrate status --schema prisma/schema/schema.prisma
scripts.db:studio: npm run db:build && PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE=binary prisma studio --schema prisma/schema/schema.prisma
